an4.205:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you a bad person and a worse person,
an4.205:1.2: a good person and a better person.
an4.205:2.1: And what is a bad person?
an4.205:2.2: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
an4.205:2.3: This is called a bad person.
an4.205:3.1: And what is a worse person?
an4.205:3.2: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion. And they encourage others in these same qualities.
an4.205:3.10: This is called a worse person.
an4.205:4.1: And what is a good person?
an4.205:4.2: It’s someone who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
an4.205:4.3: This is called a good person.
an4.205:5.1: And what is a better person?
an4.205:5.2: It’s someone who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion. And they encourage others in these same qualities.
an4.205:5.10: This is called a better person.”
